definition: to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: This airplane most major characteristic is the bomb-carrying capacity is big.
sentences.chinese: 該飛機最大的特點是載彈量大。

sentences.english: Same number of bullets per mag as M82.
sentences.chinese: 每個彈夾中與M82載彈量相同。
